group_1.textRight: Shoot, I got too deep into our Bible too…

group_1.textLeft: She does have muscles, but she's not as@brawny as this…

group_1.textRight: Geeze… Don't look at me so coldly!

group_1.textLeft: …And I'd say it's a little too cartoonish to be@a proper portrait.

group_1.textRight: What kind of style are you after?

group_1.textLeft: That's… I'm not sure. I just know I'd prefer@something with a little more realism.

group_1.textRight: I guess that's a good point…@My style is influenced a lot by MagiKiri.

group_1.textLeft: I think it's a good piece of manga, but it's not@the direction I'm seeking.
No matter how much I act and learn from you,@I can't expect my portraiture skills to improve.
I'm sorry, but I think I need to consult with@someone else, Master…

group_1.textRight: [chara:101200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]W-wait just a sec! Ah, erm…
Oh!
It's Kaede! Let me run over and go get her!

group_1.textLeft: Erm…

group_1.textRight: If you haven't picked out a style! The trick is to@look at other people's art!
And then, and then… That'll give you a sense@of direction!

group_1.textLeft: I'm not against that, but I'd rather just improve@my own drawing skills…

group_1.textRight: Looking at other people's art is super@important, though.
It gives you inspiration AND improves your@drawing skills… It's a two-for-one special!

group_1.textCenter: (...It's hard to say no when she's so desperate.)
(It feels like I've been dragged around by@her whims too.)
(Still, it would take me a long time to find@a new teacher…)

group_1.textLeft: …Very well.

group_1.textRight: Great! Just leave it to Master Karin, then!
A portrait of Chisato?

group_1.textLeft: Exactly! [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Wait, you know her?
Yes, though we haven't interacted extensively.
Chisato and I transferred into the same school@as Kaede and her friends.

group_1.textRight: If you know her personality, then, it should be@much easier for you to draw her portrait!
I'm not very good at drawing, though…

group_1.textLeft: You're so gentle, though!@Girls like you have a natural talent for art!

group_1.textRight: Mm… That might be your bias talking…

group_1.textLeft: Please do it for my sake.@I need it in order to grow.

group_1.textRight: To grow… Hm… Then I'll give it a shot!@[chara:101101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101101:cheek_0][chara:101101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]Just don't set your expectations too high, okay?
There, all done.

group_1.textLeft: …Your style is certainly very different@from Karin's.
It's not realistic, but it's simple and captures@her features.
I think I could imitate a style like that.

group_1.textRight: Mmm…!

group_1.textLeft: Master Karin…?

group_1.textRight: It's super nice and adorable, but…

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't have any punch!

group_1.textRight: Geeze…

group_1.textLeft: Um, no… We certainly don't need to punch it…

group_1.textRight: Ah, you made it just in time!
Hey, why don't we have them both draw@some portraits too?
If we get lots of people drawing her, I'm sure@you'll find that "punch" you're looking for!

group_1.textLeft: Great idea!
Oh, so you don't have to literally punch things…

group_1.textRight: Alright, let's get everyone in Kamihama@to draw a picture of Chisato!
If we get everyone to draw the same person,@that'll be a masterpiece in and of itself!

group_1.textLeft: No, um… This wasn't part of my plan…@I just want to work on my drawing skills…

group_1.textRight: C'mon, let's go find everyone!

group_1.textLeft: Umm, that's…

group_1.textRight: Takina! This IS for working on your drawing@skills!
It's important for artists to visit all the places@they can!
Experiencing new and different sensations feeds@into your work… That's what art is all about!

group_1.textLeft: I-it is…?
(I really AM just caught up in her whims,@aren't I…?)

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Keep it up!

group_1.textCenter: You're so excited to have someone calling you@"Master."
